Aquarius.Notes: Aquarius, "The Water-Bearer", is one of the constellations of the zodiac. Eleven exoplanet systems have been found in Aquarius as of 2013. Deep-sky objects: Helix Nebula (NGC 7293).
captions: The constellation Aquarius as it can be seen by the naked eye
The green bean galaxy J2240 lies in the constellation of Aquarius<template><title>sfn</title><part><name index="1"/><value>ESO 2012</value></part></template>
